table_of_contents.title: Copia do manuscripto de "O parnazo obsequioso."
Obras de Claudio M. da Costa (p. [245]-248)

subtitle: O parnazo obsequioso e as "Cartas chilenas."
title: ...O inconfidente Claudio Manoel da Costa.
notes: The "Cartas chilenas" here attributed to Claudio Manoel da Costa, has been variously ascribed to Thomaz Antonio Gonzaga and to Ignacio José de Alvarenga Peixoto.  The preponderance of evidence is in favor of Gonzaga, as shown in the official edition of the "Cartas chilenas" published 1940 by the initiative of the Brazilian minister of education and the director of the National library, Rio de Janeiro, and edited by Afonso Arinos de Melo Franco.
